results.title: Effect of successful hypertension control by manidipine or lisinopril on albuminuria and left ventricular mass in diabetic hypertensive patients with microalbuminuria.
results.text_hl: Effect of successful @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ control by @CHEMICAL_manidipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:C054218 @@@manidipine@@@ or @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ on @DISEASE_Albuminuria @DISEASE_MESH:D000419 @@@albuminuria@@@ and left @<m>DISEASE_MASS_syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536030 @@@ventricular mass@@@ in @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@diabetic hypertensive@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with microalbuminuria.

citations.NLM: Fogari R, Mugellini A, Zoppi A, Lazzari P, Destro M, Rinaldi A, Preti P. Effect of successful hypertension control by manidipine or lisinopril on albuminuria and left ventricular mass in diabetic hypertensive patients with microalbuminuria. Eur J Clin Pharmacol. 2005 Aug;61(7):483-90. PMID: 16021438
citations.BibTeX: @article{16021438, title={Effect of successful hypertension control by manidipine or lisinopril on albuminuria and left ventricular mass in diabetic hypertensive patients with microalbuminuria.}, author={Fogari R and Mugellini A and Zoppi A and Lazzari P and Destro M and Rinaldi A and Preti P}, journal={Eur J Clin Pharmacol}, volume={61}, number={7}, pages={483-90}}

results.title: Interventions for preventing and treating cardiac complications in Duchenne and Becker muscular dystrophy and X-linked dilated cardiomyopathy.
results.text_hl: Adverse event rates were similar between the placebo and treatment groups (low-certainty evidence).A study comparing treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ versus @CHEMICAL_Losartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019808 @@@losartan@@@ in 23 boys newly diagnosed with @DISEASE_Cardiomyopathies @DISEASE_MESH:D009202 @@@Duchenne cardiomyopathy@@@ showed that after 12 months, both were equally effective in preserving or improving LVEF% (@<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ 54.6% (standard deviation (SD) 5.19), @CHEMICAL_Losartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019808 @@@losartan@@@ 55.2% (SD 7.19); mean difference (MD) -0.60% CI -6.67 to 5.47: N = 16).

citations.NLM: Bourke JP, Bueser T, Quinlivan R. Interventions for preventing and treating cardiac complications in Duchenne and Becker muscular dystrophy and X-linked dilated cardiomyopathy. Cochrane Database Syst Rev. 2018 Oct 16;10(10):CD009068. PMID: 30326162
citations.BibTeX: @article{30326162, title={Interventions for preventing and treating cardiac complications in Duchenne and Becker muscular dystrophy and X-linked dilated cardiomyopathy.}, author={Bourke JP and Bueser T and Quinlivan R}, journal={Cochrane Database Syst Rev}, volume={10}, number={10}, pages={CD009068}}
